column3: Slafborn would like nothing more than to impose upon your kindness yet again.
It would seem that your work in Revenant's Toll is finished, as Alphinaud has requested you return and inform him of your progress in person. Journey to the Waking Sands and oblige the young man.

Alphinaud cannot spare a moment to speak with you at length, as preparations for the relocation are behind schedule. Taking advantage of your prompt return, he bids you scour the Waking Sands for any packages labeled for shipment to Revenant's Toll.

A cursory search yields four labeled packages. Though your average <Sheet(Race,PlayerParameter(71),0)/> might struggle to carry them all, the task poses no challenge to an experienced adventurer such as you. Take the packages to Tataru outside the Waking Sands and complete Alphinaud's errand.
No sooner have you washed your hands of one errand than Tataru begs your assistance with another. With luck, it will take no longer than the previous one...
Speak with Alphinaud in the Waking Sands.
Give the labeled packages to Tataru outside the Waking Sands.

I can't tell you how grateful we all are to have you here, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>─now more than ever. We have a major crisis on our hands, one which will demand your full attention for the next few weeks.
...You honestly believed me, didn't you?  I daresay you've become too accustomed to running our errands.
No, your work here is finished, for now. Alphinaud bids you return to the Waking Sands and inform him in person of your progress.
As much as I would like to impose upon you further, Alphinaud was insistent that you return to Vesper Bay at once.
Oh, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>─you've returned, I see. I am told you were kept quite busy in Revenant's Toll.
We too have had nary a moment's rest. Truth be told, we're a little behind schedule.
Mayhap you can help us catch up. There are a number of packages which must needs be delivered to Revenant's Toll at earliest convenience.

Pray refrain from giving me that look─I need you only to take the packages in question upstairs to Tataru─she will handle the rest. They're scattered about the halls, but each is clearly labeled, so you should have little trouble finding them. Now, if you would excuse me.
I do wish to speak with you at length, but you've caught me at an inopportune time. When you've finished that errand, we will talk.
Uwaaah! So much to do, so much to do! At this rate, we'll <Emphasis>never</Emphasis> make it to Revenant's Toll!
Bless your heart, I had completely forgotten about those!
Let me check the labels against my list... Oh, these are the last ones! Thank the Twelve, it's almost─
Oh dear, I <Emphasis>did</Emphasis> contact the courier, didn't I? Um...
Ah─I had been meaning to contact <Emphasis>you</Emphasis>, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! I've an important personal request, which I dare entrust only to you.
